trans-unit.source: Provides a managed equivalent of an unmanaged host.
trans-unit.target: Gir et administrert tilsvarer en ubehandlet vert.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.AppDomainManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.AppDomainManager"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets the application activator that handles the activation of add-ins and manifest-based applications for the domain.
trans-unit.target: Henter aktivatoren programmet som behandler aktivering av tillegg og manifest-baserte programmer for domenet.

trans-unit.source: There is a single designated instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ApplicationActivator> class in each <xref:System.AppDomain> to which all add-in and manifest-based application activation calls are routed.
trans-unit.target: Det er en bestemt forekomst av den <xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ApplicationActivator>klassen i hver <xref:System.AppDomain>aktivering kall rutes til som alle tillegget og manifest-basert program.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ApplicationActivator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomainManager> for the current <xref:System.AppDomain> can provide its own custom <xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ApplicationActivator>, or an instance of the default <xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ApplicationActivator> is created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.AppDomainManager>for gjeldende <xref:System.AppDomain>kan gi sine egne egendefinerte <xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ApplicationActivator>, eller en forekomst av standard <xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ApplicationActivator>er opprettet.</xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ApplicationActivator> </xref:System.Runtime.Hosting.ApplicationActivator> </xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.AppDomainManager>

trans-unit.source: The application activator.
trans-unit.target: Programmet aktivatoren.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified operation is allowed in the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den angitte operasjonen er tillatt i programdomenet.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering av denne metoden returnerer `false`.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.IncreaseQuotaTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method has been called to increase the isolated storage quota.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når den <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.IncreaseQuotaTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden kalles for å øke lagringskvoten for isolerte.</xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageFile.IncreaseQuotaTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An application that hosts the common language runtime (CLR) can override the CheckSecuritySettings method to perform policy decisions based on an <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageSecurityState> object (which inherits <xref:System.Security.SecurityState>), and can then allow or prevent the increase.
trans-unit.target: Et program som er vert for common language runtime (CLR) kan overstyre metoden CheckSecuritySettings for å utføre policy avgjørelsene som er basert på en <xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageSecurityState>objektet (som arver <xref:System.Security.SecurityState>), og kan tillate eller hindre økningen.</xref:System.Security.SecurityState> </xref:System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorageSecurityState>

trans-unit.source: For example, a host could prompt the end user to approve or deny the request to increase the quota.
trans-unit.target: Vert kan for eksempel be sluttbrukeren å godta eller avslå forespørselen om å øke kvoten.

trans-unit.source: The host's implementation of CheckSecuritySettings should take into account the possibility of denial-of-service attacks.
trans-unit.target: Den verten implementeringen av CheckSecuritySettings skal ta hensyn muligheten for avslag service angrep.

trans-unit.source: For example, it should prompt the user only if the method is called from a user-initiated event such as a button click.
trans-unit.target: Det må for eksempel Spør brukeren om metoden kalles fra en Brukerstartet hendelse som en knapp Klikk.

trans-unit.source: A subclass of <xref href="System.Security.SecurityState"></xref> that identifies the operation whose security status is requested.
trans-unit.target: En underklasse av <xref href="System.Security.SecurityState"> </xref> som identifiserer operasjonen med sikkerhetsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: if the host allows the operation specified by state to be performed in the application domain; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Hvis verten tillater operasjonen som er angitt av state skal utføres i programdomenet; ellers, .

trans-unit.source: Returns a new or existing application domain.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en ny eller eksisterende programdomene.

trans-unit.source: The friendly name, specified by the `friendlyName` parameter, can be displayed in user interfaces to identify the domain.
trans-unit.target: Det egendefinerte navnet som er angitt av den `friendlyName` parameteren kan vises i brukergrensesnitt til å identifisere domenet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.AppDomain.FriendlyName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.AppDomain.FriendlyName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.AppDomain.FriendlyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default CreateDomain method calls the protected <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CreateDomainHelper%2A> method to create the <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: CreateDomain standardmetoden kaller beskyttede- <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CreateDomainHelper%2A>metoden til å opprette <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.AppDomainManager.CreateDomainHelper%2A>

trans-unit.source: Overrides of this method do not need to call the <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CreateDomainHelper%2A> method but can return an existing domain.
trans-unit.target: Overstyring av denne metoden trenger ikke å kalle den <xref:System.AppDomainManager.CreateDomainHelper%2A>metoden, men kan returnere et eksisterende domene.</xref:System.AppDomainManager.CreateDomainHelper%2A>

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the domain.
trans-unit.target: Det egendefinerte navnet på domenet.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains evidence mapped through the security policy to establish a top-of-stack permission set.
trans-unit.target: Angi et objekt som inneholder tegn som er tilordnet til sikkerhetspolicyen å opprette en toppen av stakken tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains application domain initialization information.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder programmet initialisering domeneinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: A new or existing application domain.
trans-unit.target: En ny eller eksisterende programdomene.

trans-unit.source: Provides a helper method to create an application domain.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en helper metode for å opprette et programdomene.

trans-unit.source: This protected helper method handles the creation of a new application domain.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden for beskyttet helper behandler oppretting av en ny programdomene.

trans-unit.source: This friendly name, specified by the `friendlyName` parameter, can be displayed in user interfaces to identify the domain.
trans-unit.target: Det egendefinerte navnet, angitt av den `friendlyName` parameteren kan vises i brukergrensesnitt til å identifisere domenet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.AppDomain.FriendlyName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.AppDomain.FriendlyName%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.AppDomain.FriendlyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the domain.
trans-unit.target: Det egendefinerte navnet på domenet.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains evidence mapped through the security policy to establish a top-of-stack permission set.
trans-unit.target: Angi et objekt som inneholder tegn som er tilordnet til sikkerhetspolicyen å opprette en toppen av stakken tillatelse.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains application domain initialization information.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder programmet initialisering domeneinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: A newly created application domain.
trans-unit.target: En nyopprettede programdomene.

trans-unit.source: friendlyName is .
trans-unit.target: friendlyNameis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the entry assembly for an application.
trans-unit.target: Henter oppføring-samlingen for en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: If the application is a manifest-activated application, the entry assembly is determined from the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet er et manifest er aktivert, bestemmes oppføring samlingen fra programmanifestet.

trans-unit.source: If the application is not manifest activated, the entry assembly is the process executable in the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet ikke er manifest aktivert, er oppføring-samlingen prosessen kjørbare programdomenet standard.

trans-unit.source: In other application domains, the entry assembly is the first executable that was executed by the <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: I andre programdomener oppføring-samlingen er den første kjørbare filen som ble utført av den <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The entry assembly for the application.
trans-unit.target: Oppføring-samlingen for programmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the host execution context manager that manages the flow of the execution context.
trans-unit.target: Henter verten kjøring av konteksten manager som administrerer flyten av utføringskontekst.

trans-unit.source: This property allows a host to provide a <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager> that can participate in the flow of the execution context across asynchronous calls.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan en vert for å angi en <xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager>som kan delta i flyten av utføringskontekst på tvers av asynkrone kall.</xref:System.Threading.HostExecutionContextManager>

trans-unit.source: The host execution context manager.
trans-unit.target: Vert kjøring av konteksten manager.

trans-unit.source: Gets the host security manager that participates in security decisions for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Henter host security manager som deltar i sikkerhet avgjørelser for programdomenet.

trans-unit.source: This property allows a host to provide a <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager> to participate in the security decisions for the application domain.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan en vert for å angi en <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager>delta i sikkerhet-avgjørelsene for programdomenet.</xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager>

trans-unit.source: The host security manager.
trans-unit.target: Vert security manager.

trans-unit.source: Gets the initialization flags for custom application domain managers.
trans-unit.target: Henter initialisering flaggene for egendefinert program domene ledere.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that describe the initialization action to perform.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjonen av verdier opplisting som beskriver initialisering handlingen som skal utføres.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.AppDomainManagerInitializationOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.AppDomainManagerInitializationOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the new application domain.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer nye programdomenet.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains application domain initialization information.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder programmet initialisering domeneinformasjon.
